unnormalised: Arre yaar, Sharma case vishim aiklay mhunn? IPC Section 304, barobar na? Gair-iradentlo khoon. Adv. Verma tankam ladta, mhaka dista. Tankam thodoso aaram mellcho, asslem tori puravo khub khatri korpacho asa. Aiklay verdict 15/07/2024 meren yeupachi asa. Polleun gheumya judge kitem mhunta!
normalised: Arre yaar, Sharma case vixheayim aikolem? I-P-C Section teen she ani char, baraabar? Manslaughter. Advocate Verma tankam zhujtat, mhaka distha. Tankam thodoso fayo mellcho, mhunn aasha, punn puravo baraobhar khotro. Aikolaam ki nirnnoyo pondhra Julay don hozar ani chauvis meren yeuno yeyeta. Polleun di, nyaayadheesh kitem sangta mhunn!
text: Arre yaar, Sharma case vishim aiklay mhunn? IPC Section 304, barobar na? Gair-iradentlo khoon. Adv. Verma tankam ladta, mhaka dista. Tankam thodoso aaram mellcho, asslem tori puravo khub khatri korpacho asa. Aiklay verdict 15/07/2024 meren yeupachi asa. Polleun gheumya judge kitem mhunta!
